overview:
South Coast Recovery is one of the most successful Alcohol and Drug Rehabilitation Centers in California. The company caters to patients of various backgrounds and experiences and is committed to providing treatment and rehabilitation programs to those who reach out for help in building a solid recovery foundation to help them move on with life.

Components of South Coast’s treatment program includes Relapse Prevention, Anger Management, Goal Setting, Values Clarification, Skills Development, Self-Esteem, Life Planning Skills, Relationships, Group Process, 12 Step Study Groups and more.

The center’s unique program also teaches the keys to living a happy, sober lifetime; not just how to get sober in the short run.

More information about the company and its programs may be found at www.southcoastrecovery.com.
